definition: clothes dryer for drying and ironing laundry by passing it between two heavy heated rollers, destroy or injure severely
details:
noun
- clothes dryer for drying and ironing laundry by passing it between two heavy heated rollers
verb
- destroy or injure severely
= synonyms: cut up
- alter so as to make unrecognizable
= synonyms: murder
- injure badly by beating
= synonyms: maul
- press with a mangle
= example: press with a mangle
